tuv.seg: What is a television licence and how much does it cost?
Tá cur síos anseo ar cheadúnais teilifíse
Making a complaint about a TV or radio programme
Gearán a dhéanamh maidir le clár teilifíse nó raidió in Éirinn
The Broadcasting Authority of Ireland (BAI) evaluates and judges complaints about TV and radio programmes broadcast in Ireland
Tá cur síos sa cháipéis seo conas gearán a dhéanamh maidir le clár teilifíse nó raidió chuig an tÚdarás Craolacháin na hÉireann
Making a complaint about a newspaper or magazine
Gearán a dhéanamh faoi nuachtán nó faoi iris
The Press Ombudsman resolves complaints made about Irish newspapers or magazines quickly and free of charge
Réitíonn Ombudsman an Phreasa gearáin a dhéanann an pobal in aghaidh nuachtáin agus irisí na hÉireann go tapa agus saor in aisce
Publications and periodicals in Ireland are still subject to censorship
Déantar cinsireacht i gcónaí ar fhoilseacháin agus ar thréimhseacháin in Éirinn
This document provides an overview of the current legal situation regarding censorship and discusses how certain publications can be prohibited
Cur síos atá sa cháipéis seo ar an dlí faoi láthair maidir le cinsireacht agus cén chaoi inár féidir foilseacháin faoi leith a chosc

The Irish Film Classification Office examines all films and videos intended for public viewing in Ireland to see if they are fit to be viewed by the public and classifies films and videos according to their suitability for different age groups
Scrúdaíonn an Cinsire Scannán gach scannán agus fístéip a bhfuil sé i gceist a scaipeadh ar an bpobal le cinntiú go bhfuileadar sásúil le go mbeadh an pobal ag breathnú orthu
Censorship of video and DVD recordings
Cinsireacht Taifeadtaí Fístéipe agus DVD
The Irish Film Classification Office is responsible for examining all video and DVD recordings for sale or distribution in Ireland
Tá dualgas ar an gCinsire Scannán scrúdú a dhéanamh ar gach taifeadadh fístéipe/DVD atá le díol nó le dáileadh in Éirinn
Most Read in "Consumer Affairs"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Gnóthaí Tomhaltóirí"
Your rights as a consumer in Ireland
Cearta Tomhaltóirí in Éirinn
Display of prices for goods and services
Carr athláimhe a cheannach
Replacements, refunds and credit notes
Taispeáint praghsanna d'earraí agus seirbhísí
